entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of snow. Low minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of snow or rain showers. Risk of freezing drizzle late this evening and overnight. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 6:53 PM EST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of snow. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of snow early in the morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 6:53 PM EST Wednesday 01 March 2023
